messages.message: How do you describe DevOps to a recruiter?
That's sounds like an opening to a really geeky joke :-). Thus far my attempts haven't been terribly fruitful, especially coming from the security/access/privilege side of the house.
Brilliant! Haha. When I think of a joke I will get back to you. ;)
It is a great question though...something I need to figure out if I'm going to stay in IT.

I tell them it's a combination of understanding a large code base (and release cycle), supporting customers (selenium QA) and infrastructure support. I think AWS actually offers a course on this. I use to just call it development. ;)
